game.name: Nebula
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Survive in the deep void of the galaxy against thousands of invaders! Nebula is a challenging bullet hell, twin stick shooter where you have to face endless waves of space enemies. Additional map resources and space drones can provide you a support but be wary, they can as well become a deadly trap.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive in the deep void of the galaxy against thousands of invaders! Nebula is a challenging bullet hell, twin stick shooter where you have to face endless waves of space enemies. Additional map resources and space drones can provide you a support but be wary, they can as well become a deadly trap.

reviewHighlights.text: 타게팅에임이며 옵션이며 인공지능이 판단하는 기준이 이상함 덜떨어진 느낌
투사체 증가 옵션이 뭔가 이상함 동시에 발사하는 수가 아니라, 연발수 증가임
